name: Mysteries of Maple Grove K-12 School (Demo Version)
name_original: Mysteries of Maple Grove K-12 School (Demo Version)
description:
⚠ Content Warning ⚠  

The full game will feature minor gore, human experimentation, murder, drugging and kidnapping. More content warnings will be added as the game is updated. Please do not play if any of these topics are upsetting to you. I do not condone the actions done throughout the story.

Synopsis:

You're a young kindergarten student named Katarina Larson (name changeable in final version) eagerly awaiting Valentine's Day.  Get through February 13th without... too much issue as you survive the school day. Interact with your classmates and engage in fun activities such as murder and poisoning! As you play throughout the school weeks, you will uncover the school's various mysteries. 

Mysteries that you may or may not be involved in. 

Remember not to trust anybody in this school. Or you may be next~

Features:

- The Demo Version features 2 quests: Playground Princess & Lethal Lovesickness. The story has 5K words and will take about 30 minutes to finish.

- The current choices will always lead to the correct ending. The game will indicate whether you've made a correct choice or not. This feature will be removed in the final game.

- The full game will feature multiple quests, multiple endings, save and load menus, art, background, and the ability to change the protagonist's name. 

Assets:

Background Image: Sourced from Freepix and Pexels

Writing & Coding: Me :))

Additional Information:

This twine game is inspired by the game series: Kindergarten 1 & 2. I was inspired to use the idea of a mysterious school and a time-loop. However, the plot itself is separated from the inspired source material. Feedback on this game is greatly appreciated! This is my first game and hope that you will enjoy playing through it.
